attributes.action: Create a new army recruitment advertisement
attributes.background:
We have many recruitment adverts but none really appeal to the standard British citizen and so I aim to have a good army recruitment advertisement, not like CAPITA's but something on the lines of the Royal Commando's.
This not only appeals to people but shows our standards.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about Army recruitment videos, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure what you mean by a "good army recruitment advertisement".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
